description:
A sturdy 14" bike with stabilisers.

 14"bike equipped with a bell, stabilisers featuring tool-free removal, and a mudguard. Brakes designed to suit children's hands and chain guard that's ideal for learning to ride in complete safety.

6 to 9-year olds (120 to 135 cm) wanting to start mountain biking.

To take on the first slopes, our engineers have equipped this kids' MTB with 6 speeds. This bike allows the rider to take on sloped terrains.

Designed for children aged 9 to 12 years (135 to 155 cm) who want to learn how to ride a hybrid bike.

A children's 24-inch, white, 6-speed bike with a comfortable saddle. Children can ride anywhere on this bike, from trails to town

We've designed this bike specially for and with beginners: reassuring tyres, simple speed changes, and straight handlebars!

Discover the ideal bike for starting out: with only one chainring, you'll never end up in the wrong gear! Great comfort thanks to the 32mm tyres, allowing you to take on any road or trail with gusto!

A simple, practical, affordable folding bike

Are you looking for an affordable bike that you can take anywhere? The simple, practical Tilt 100 can be easily stored in your car boot. Enjoy a great ride on relatively flat terrain

children aged 4 to 6 (1.05 to 1.20 m tall) learning to ride on two wheels.

16" bike with a mudguard, stand, bell and lights. The brakes are suited to children's hands and the full chain guard ensures a safe ride

This Elops 120 city bike offered you the comfortable and efficiency commuting in the city.

A simple town bike that is easy to handle and includes a lifetime warranty on the frame.

The Riverside 500 hybrid bike has been designed for frequent cycling over short to middle distances on the road or on gravel tracks.

Looking for a lightweight, comfortable bike? With its 100% aluminium frame, designed to keep you from back aches while riding, the B'Twin Riverside 500 is perfectly designed for your weekend rides.

productName: TRIBAN RC 520 CYCLE TOURING ROAD BIKE CN
description:
We've designed and tested this road bike for your regular rides. It provides matchless comfort for cycling further and more often.

Cycle further and more often with the most comfortable road bike we've ever designed. Discover its hydro-mechanical disc brakes, specially-designed geometry, and the Shimano 105 groupset.

productName: ROCKRIDER ST 500 KIDS' 24-INCH MOUNTAIN BIKE 9-12 YEARS - NEON YELLOW
description:
We have designed this mountain bike for 9- to 12-year-olds (135 to 150 cm) wanting to regularly go mountain biking.

To ensure riders can easily overcome rough terrain, we've equipped this 24-inch MTB with a suspension fork. Easily tackle hilly paths with the 6 speeds.
